1. PlayStation Fans Left Amazed After Sony Reveals Surprise PS3 Update – Even If It Doesn’t Do Much  IGN

  3. Sony's PS3 gets new system software update, 19 years after release  Eurogamer

item.title: I Failed To Prevent A Catastrophe In Avowed And I Love It - Kotaku
item.description:
1. I Failed To Prevent A Catastrophe In Avowed And I Love It  Kotaku
  2. I don't care about being able to kill everybody and steal the Mayor's pants in an RPG like Avowed, and I'm tired of pretending it's mandatory  PC Gamer
  3. Avowed understands the appeal of a lil' Waterfall Treasure  The A.V. Club
  4. Some of Avowed's most memorable smaller instances are reminding me of the magic of Red Dead Redemption 2's random encounters  Gamesradar
  5. Weekend Gamer: Avowed  Type PAD
